sentences.en: " What a gambler you are, Scarlett, " he jeered.
sentences.cn: " 思嘉,你可真是个赌徒! " 他嘲讽地说.

sentences.en: And the gambler's instincts took over.
sentences.cn: 接着赌徒的冲动占了上风.

sentences.en: He became a strategic master planner and a multimillionaire gambler.
sentences.cn: 他是犯罪战略规划大师,又是千万富翁赌徒.

sentences.en: He had never been afraid of failure: he was a gambler, ready to go off somewhere else and start all over again.
sentences.cn: 他从来都不害怕失败：他是个冒险家，随时准备到别处从头再来。

sentences.en: He was a compulsive gambler and often heavily in debt.
sentences.cn: 他嗜赌成癖，常常债台高筑。

sentences.en: He was no more successful as a gambler very quickly he was in debt.
sentences.cn: 他在赌场上很不顺利,很快就负债了.

sentences.en: He was nothing more than gambler's agent.
sentences.cn: 他不过是个赌徒的代理人而已.

sentences.en: He was notorious as a gambler.
I used to be a very heavy gambler, but not any more. It's a mug's game.
sentences.cn: 我曾经是个赌棍，但现在再也不赌了，那是傻瓜的游戏。

sentences.en: The gambler laid his house last night.
sentences.cn: 那个赌徒昨晚以房子打赌.

sentences.en: The gambler sponged a cigarette from the man sitting next to him.
sentences.cn: 那个赌徒向坐在他旁边的人讨支烟抽.

sentences.en: The gambler turned a deaf era to all advice.
sentences.cn: 赌徒对一切劝告置若罔闻.

sentences.en: The plaintiff's sole witness, a gambler and layabout, was easily discredited.
sentences.cn: 原告唯一的证人嗜赌成性，游手好闲，其证词一下子就被推翻了。

sentences.en: There was a fellow in that casino tonight who's a very heavy gambler.
sentences.cn: 今晚那家赌场有个家伙是个嗜赌成性的赌棍。

sentences.en: While the gambler's luck was in, he gained much money.
sentences.cn: 当那个赌徒运气好时, 他赢了不少钱.
